product_description: KIND HEALTHY GRAINS Oats & Honey Granola with Toasted Coconut are an all-in-one, convenient, hand-to-mouth granola. These 100% whole grain clusters are made with 5 super grains - oats, millet, buckwheat, amaranth, quinoa and include honey and toasted coconut for a gluten free snack. Sprinkle this convenient snack over yogurt, cereal or smoothies for a whole grain addition to your breakfast, or enjoy this gluten free granola anytime throughout the day. These wholesome clusters are low sodium snacks as well as a good source of fiber*. These gluten free snacks are Non-GMO Project Verified. Healthy snacks are smarter snacks. Snack KIND! *Contains 5 grams of fat per serving

name: Nature's Path Organic Honey Almond Granola, 11 oz (Pack of 1), Gluten Free, Non-GMO
short_description: Contains: 1 Pouch of Nature's Path Honey Almond Granola, 11 ounces
Large crunchy granola cluster made from organic whole grains, almonds, chia seeds, and the sweetness of organic clover honey.
Organic whole grains offer a boost of healthy fiber for great digestion, omega-3 rich chia seeds help support heart health, and crunchy almonds are a tasty source of plant based protein.
Each serving is full of gluten-free goodness, 15g of whole grains, and 3g of protein.
Our planet, our food and our bodies are all connected. Being mindful about your food and choosing to eat organic means you’re making the best choice for your health, and our planet.
A pack of 11-Ounce
Gluten free rolled oats; roasted almonds; chia seeds
Gluten free and organic; Non GMO
Uniited States
product_description: Looking for a healthy, gluten free breakfast that'll make your taste buds buzz? Look no further than our flavorful Nature's Path Honey Almond Granola. You'll fall in love with the exciting combo of crunchy Californian almonds and chia seeds mixed with crispy whole grain oat clusters, all sweetened with organic clover honey, providing 28g of whole grains, 4g of fiber, 5g of plant protein. Enjoy it as a wholesome breakfast or as an on-the-go snack thanks to the convenient resealable zip top pouch, and take comfort in the knowledge that you're eating well in the morning, during the day, or in the evening (sneaky Midnight snack, anyone?). At Nature's Path we hold organic to an even higher standard: to build and regenerate the soil. As pioneers of the organic movement, we believe organic food and farming is the best way to care for our bodies and for the planet. We always have and always will use our voice to stand for what we believe is right, and what organic truly means.

name: MadeGood Granola Bites Chocolate Chip & Mixed Berry Variety Pack (28 Count) Gluten Free and Organic Snacks
short_description: Contains 28 (0.85 oz) MadeGood Granola Mini pouches - (14) Chocolate Chip (14) Mixed Berry 28 bags of granola minis! Sweet, salty, chewy, and - most importantly - healthy, our individually wrapped, high cocoa and organic berry granola recipes make delicious snacks.
Low Sugar and loaded with crunch means more goodness in every chunk and grain. MadeGood Granola Minis make an awesome pick-me-up before work or exercise. Safe for school - peanut and tree nut free!

MadeGood granola is lower calorie and higher protein than other granola snacks, with cleaner ingredients - Non-GMO Project Certified. Made in a dedicated bakery, these snacks are free of the top allergens including nuts, gluten, and dairy.
A full serving of vegetables sneaks into every yummy individual package (yes, even the chocolate ones!). Six hidden veggie extracts harmonize with gluten-free oats and berry/chocolate pieces.

MadeGood Granola Minis shine as to-go cereal/breakfast food for kids, college students, and working adults. From trail survival to everyday pantry raids, these convenient little packs brighten your day, nature's way.

name: Nature’s Garden Clusters Peanut Crunch, 32oz Pouch – Big Chunky Nut & Pretzel Snack Bites with Almonds, Pecans – Crunchy, Nutrient-Dense, Guilt-Free Treats for Adults & Kids
short_description: NATURALLY LARGE CLUSTERS – Say goodbye to granola crumbs. Oversized, chunky clusters deliver maximum crunch and satisfying texture.
SALTY-SWEET FLAVOR – Nature's Garden Peanut Crunch Clusters mix crunchy nuts and pretzels for a crave-worthy salty-sweet bite.
WHOLESOME INGREDIENTS – Non-GMO, kosher certified, and free from artificial flavors and colors—snacking you can trust.
UNMATCHED CONVENIENCE – No prep, no containers, no crumbs. Just grab a handful and let the resealable pouch keep Clusters fresh wherever you go.
SNACK YOUR WAY – Enjoy straight from the bag, mix into yogurt, splash with milk, or use as a crunchy topping for versatile snacking.
product_description: Granola just got outclassed. Nature’s Garden Peanut Crunch Clusters take nuts, pretzels, and other craveable inclusions and pack them into naturally large, chunky bites made for real crunch lovers. With peanuts, almonds, pecans, and mini twisted pretzels, every cluster strikes the perfect salty-sweet balance—indulgent enough to brag about, wholesome enough to keep in your daily rotation. No boring flavors, no crumbly mess—just snack-first deliciousness you can grab straight from the bag. Each bite brings unmatched flavor, texture, and nutrition for convenient snacking whereever you are. Enjoy them right out of the pouch, scatter over yogurt, or even sprinkle on ice cream for a crunchy twist. From busy mornings to lazy afternoons, these Clusters deliver crispy, crunchy satisfaction you’ll keep coming back for. Packed in a generous 32oz resealable, recyclable pouch, they’re convenient, eco-friendly, and always ready when snack time calls. Naturally flavored, non-GMO, and endlessly versatile, Nature’s Garden Clusters do what granola never could—make snacking exciting again.
